/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler      -Xptxas -O1     --dopt=on     -use_fast_math     -v     --extra-device-vectorization      -O3 -DNDEBUG --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[compute_86,sm_86] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/tmml_1.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tmml_1.dir/tmml.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tmml_1.dir/tmml.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/tmml_1.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
